title: Speak Your Thoughts or Stay Out the Way?
itunes:title: Speak Your Thoughts or Stay Out the Way?
description:
Thursday 3/23- After Rick Ross spoke out about not trusting Meek with Nicki, we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners are the type to give their opinion about a friends situation or do they mind their business. Also, on the show Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to James Jackson for a hate crime and Angela gave some advice to some listeners for Ask Yee.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
